tool_description: Get comprehensive country code data easily with CodesOfCountry API.
name: CodesOfCountry
title: CodesOfCountry

api_list.name: Get single country
api_list.description: Get all available codes of a country

api_list.name: Get all countries
api_list.description: Get basic codes of all countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://codesofcountry1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codesofcountry1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://codesofcountry1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codesofcountry1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
